title: Meownday is Over: 26 Fantastically Funny Feline Memes Purrsuing Furiday Like Your Cat Hunting a Lone Piece of Lint
description: Whew, thank Ceiling Cat that we made it through the ruffest day of the week - Meowndays. There's nothing worse than hearing your alarm go off at 7 AM after being able to sleep in all weekend, getting up in the cold weather, and leaving your cute cats home alone while you go into the office for 8+ hours. But once we make it through Meownday, everything starts to get a little easier. Then we can finally set our sights on Furiday, and then, Caturday.But our purrsuance of Furriday on Tuesday is about as useful as our cats hunting a lone piece of lint that is hiding under the couch. Futile, one might even say. However, it gives us something to look forward to; some hope that we will make it to the weekend in one piece. That's why Ceiling Cat invented funny felines in meme form, to help us get through the difficult times in the best way pawssible - laughing. So get your giggle on and get ready to pounce into Furiday because it's coming (in only 96 more hours)!
author: Blake Seidel
excerpt: Meownday is Over: 26 Fantastically Funny Feline Memes Purrsuing Furiday Like Your Cat Hunting a Lone Piece of Lint - World's largest collection of cat memes and other animals
text: You may talk to us before 9 AM under these three, very specific conditions:1. We must have had at least one cup of coffee furst2. You must bring us coffee, let us take one satisfying sip, and then speak3. Something happened to our catsIf none of these conditions have been met, you will not get a response. Sure, we like to make fun of Boomers using technology, but in about 20 years, this is going to be us. The kids are going to have some crazy new technology that we're not going to understand and we're going to be the ones they make memes out of.
html:
You may talk to us before 9 AM under these three, very specific conditions:

1. We must have had at least one cup of coffee furst
2. You must bring us coffee, let us take one satisfying sip, and then speak
3. Something happened to our cats

If none of these conditions have been met, you will not get a response.

Sure, we like to make fun of Boomers using technology, but in about 20 years, this is going to be us. The kids are going to have some crazy new technology that we're not going to understand and we're going to be the ones they make memes out of.
